name: Block Color Game
description:
A tiny game about switching between colors to reach the flag.

-Controls-

ControlsKeyboardXboxLeftLeftDPad/Left Stick*
RightRightDPad/Left Stick*UpUpDPad/Left Stick*DownDownDPad/Left Stick*JumpZADashXXRestart Room
BackspaceSelectExit Game
EscapeStartNext Color Pallet
2RBPrevious Color Pallet
1LBFullscreen Mode
F4--

*Left stick can be used, but use at your own risk :3

-Instructions-

  1. Move, jump, and dash around the space to obtain the flag.
  2. Your block can jump on and run into gray and white blocks
  3. Dashing to a white block changes your block black, allowing you to jump on and run into black blocks.
  4. Collect the flag to complete the level.
  5. Finish 10 levels to win the game and stop the timer.
  6. You can change between 4 color pallets: Normal, Reverse, Blue, and Green.

-NOTE-

This game was just an experiment and the physics is really janky right now, but I hope you like it either way.
